summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2243, for the improvement of 6th Avenue Northwest, from West 42nd Street to West 45th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, and including a temporary connection along 8th Avenue Northwest from West 42nd Street to the existing outfall sewer along the north line of Lake Washington Canal, under Ordinance No. 23080 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
